card.name: Andros, Reuniting Reanimator
card.text: Whenever a creature leaves your graveyard, if it wasn’t from this ability, you may return target creature card with mana value less than or equal to the mana value of that creature from the graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: The Dead of Eidhos
card.text: Flying, hexproof Whenever The Dead of Eidhos attacks, investigate. T, Sacrifice 4 Clues: Exile target creature.

card.name: Rusfel, Trinket Seller
card.text: T, Exile an artifact you control: Draw a card. 3: Return an artifact you control from exile to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Aname, Dream Drifter
card.text: Flying Whenever a creature with flying you control becomes the target of a spell or ability, exile it. Return it to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: The Stalker of Nightmares
card.text: If it’s neither day nor night, it becomes day as The Stalker of Nightmares enters the battlefield. Whenever day becomes night, The Stalker of Nightmares deals damage equal to its power divided as you choose among any number of targets. Each opponent discards a card and mills a card. You gain 3 life.

card.name: Mother Anomatos
card.text: Saga spells you cast cost GWUB less to cast. This effect reduces only the amount of colored mana you pay. At the beginning of each opponent’s upkeep, you may put a lore counter on target Saga you control. T: Copy target triggered ability of a Saga you control. You may choose new targets for the copy.
